H0.text: It will destroy the fish habitat, which is how excess soil that travels downstream reduces biodiversity, as the scientist observed that loss of plants near a stream increased soil erosion downstream.

H1.text: It will provide nutrients to algae when excess soil is washed downstream, reducing biodiversity.

A4.text: The sediments themselves act as pollutants, as well as being carriers for other pollutants, such as attached pesticide molecules or heavy metals. The effect of increased sediments loads on aquatic ecosystems can be catastrophic.
